pages.text: An apple infused with Life Essence. Consuming it provides sustenance and blood; either to your soul network or to a nearby Blood Altar.

pages.title: Effects
pages.text: $(bold)When Eaten:$()$(br)$(li)Restores 3 hunger$(li)75% chance of Nausea for 2 seconds$(li)Provides LP (configurable)$(br2)$(bold)Blood Altar Nearby:$()$(br)If a Blood Altar is found within 11x21x11 blocks, the apple provides $(bold)double LP$() directly to the altar!$(br2)$(bold)No Altar:$()$(br)LP goes to your Soul Network.

pages.title: Usage Tips
pages.text: Perfect for:$(li)Quick LP generation near your altar$(li)Emergency soul network restoration$(li)Passive LP generation from farms$(br2)$(italic)An apple a day keeps the Blood Mage at play.$()
